recipe.title: Pimient d'Espelette Mayonnaise
instructions: Combine shallot, lemon juice, vinegar, and lime peel in medium bowl. Cover; let stand 30 minutes. Whisk in mayonnaise and piment d'Espelette. Season with salt and pepper. Cover; chill 2 hours. DO AHEAD: Can be made 1 day ahead. Keep chilled.
